T02D2546:17b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti manda la bidhi n'a ma /
T02D2546:17b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2546:17b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2546:17b-5: nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba'i 'gro ba la //
T02D2546:17b-6: zug rngu 'byin mdzad sman pa'i rgyal po mchog /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de btud nas //
T02D2546:17b-7: rin chen rigs kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad /
T02D2546:17b-8: de la 'dir ser sna'i gnyen por sangs rgyas rin
T02D2546:17b-9: chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas
T02D2546:17b-10: / ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i skyes
T02D2546:17b-11: bu dbang bskur ba thob pas ri bo 'am chu
T02D2546:17b-12: klung du 'byor pa dang ldan par byas te /
T02D2546:17b-13: dus tshod bzang po la bsnyen pa'i khang par zhugs
T02D2546:17b-14: la shes rab dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i blo
T02D2546:17b-15: bskyed de // gdan 'bol ba la 'dug cing mdun
T02D2546:17b-16: gyi bya ba byas nas de thag tu ma rungs
T02D2546:17b-17: pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po dran par byas la bar
T02D2546:17b-18: bskyed de // chod bsal te / nam mkha'i dbyings su dkyil 'khor la bltas la /
T02D2546:17b-19: de'i mdun du lus ngag gi dri ma bsal la
T02D2546:17b-20: sems bskyed cing sdom pa blangs nas stong pa nyid
T02D2546:17b-21: dran pa'i dbyings su skar ma lta bu'i yi ge'i
T02D2546:17b-23: de las byung ba'i khang pa dang /
T02D2546:17b-24: gzhi'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan bskyed pa dang /
T02D2546:17b-26: de dang cha mthun pa'i sems dpas bskor ba ni
T02D2546:17b-27: aa las nges par byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog
T02D2546:17b-28: dang / de rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs
T02D2546:17b-29: las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku spro ba'i las
T02D2546:17b-31: de ltar dkyil 'khor nye bar gyur nas gzhan gyi don du thugs rje shar te /
T02D2546:17b-32: dkyil 'khor bar chad med pa'i gnas su byas la /
T02D2546:18a-2: lha dgod pa ni gzhi'i sangs rgyas gtso bo rin chen 'byung ldan las /
T02D2546:18a-3: de dang cha mthun pa'i sems dpa' bzhi dang /
T02D2546:18a-4: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis bskor ba bkod la /
T02D2546:18a-5: khyams su bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod /
T02D2546:18a-6: sgo ma bzhi sgo bzhir bris te /
T02D2546:18a-7: legs par zin pa dang mchod pa yang rgyas par phul te /
T02D2546:18a-8: bstod pas bstod nas bum pa gzhug cing lha rnams dbang bskur bas bdag nyid bsgrubs la /
T02D2546:18a-9: gzhan gyi don du slob ma me tog thogs pas
T02D2546:18a-10: sdom pa 'dzin par nus pa la dkyil 'khor bstan
T02D2546:18a-11: te / de nas dbang bskur nas slar yang dkyil 'khor la mchod de /
T02D2546:18a-12: bzod par gsol zhing bshags pa bya ba dang /
T02D2546:18a-13: lha rnams bsdu zhing spyod lam ci bder bya'o //
T02D2546:18a-14: ser sna rnam dag rin chen 'byung //
T02D2546:18a-15: dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus pa las //
T02D2546:18a-16: dge ba bsags par gang gyur pa //
T02D2546:18a-17: rin chen 'byung ldan nyid thob shog //
T02D2546:18a-18: slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa /
